Laws 2019, ch. 270, § 57 repealed 7-20C-5 NMSA 1978, effective July 1, 2021. Pursuant to 12-1-8 NMSA 1978, Laws 2019, ch. 274, as the last act signed by the governor, was compiled into the NMSA 1978.
